Services & Rates

Incorporating our virtual tours into your website or social media platform has never been easier. With a simple copy and paste, the tours are embedded instantly. They can even be viewed live within your website or Facebook.

Schedule now!

All appointments are booked first come first serve once confirmation e-mail has been received. Same day cancellations are $50.

All Real Estate listings in MLS automatically get their Matterport 3D Scan published to our Matterport partners, and .

Click or tap on a service to view details

Matterport Real Estate Bundle includes:
  • — The location shall receive a full immersive Matterport 3D virtual tour with embedded links for your website, MLS, realtor.com, homes.com, social media, texts, e-mail, ect. that potential customers can click through to virtually view the entire indoor premises. Links are sent to you via email or transferred to your Matterport cloud account if applicable.
  • — A drop-down menu with customized contact information and short bio of the property.
  • — Dollhouse View
  • — Exterior 2.7k Drone Photos and exterior Nikon DSLR photos sent in a Google Drive file (If drone is in a no-flight zone, the photos cannot be taken and you will receive a refund of $25)
  • — Virtual Reality Tour
  • — 360 view snapshots of non-Matterport 3D tour friendly spaces (such as outdoor spaces and separate rooms outside of the original space) allowing customers to rotate the photo to see location and surrounding areas.
  • — Highlight Reel at the bottom of each 3D Virtual Tour
  • — Floor Plan View
  • — On-demand Measurements
Matterport Real Estate Bundle:

8,001-9,000 sq. ft:$600

Custom quote for anything above 10,000 sq. ft.

Commercial pricing available! Call for custom quote! Texts are welcome! (626)422-1964

3D Virtual Tours are hosted by Nicole's 3D Virtual Tours for six months for free.  After six months, if you'd like your space to stay active, it's half of the service fee of your product.  If not specified, spaces will be deleted after six months.

$50 travel fee for anything further than 30 miles from our location, and an additional $50 for every 50 miles away from our location in Glendora, CA.

Business Hours: Monday-Saturday 10 am-6pm (Latest appointment slot is booked at 4:00 pm to go to 6:00 pm. On site after hours fee: $100)

Real Estate Photos Alone:

All Real Estate photos alone are taken with a Nikon DSLR and 2.7k drone and lightly edited. If drone is in a no-flight zone, the drone photos cannot be taken, and you will receive a refund of $25

Exterior Only: 8 photos: $125

Twilight Shoot: $125. Includes 8 exterior twilight photos taken inside of business hours.

Assisted Living Facility Website Bundle

From Nicole's 3D Virtual Tours and Assisted Living Boost!

One of the best ways to show prospective new residents why your RCFE is the best choice for them and get them to call for an in-person tour is to show off your facility to them with a beautiful, customized 3D virtual tour and an inexpensive custom website managed by Assisted Living Boost!.

When you buy one of Nicole's custom 3D Virtual Tours at the special offer price of $300, you can have it added to to your RCFE website powered by Assisted Living Boost! for only $5 per month. Additional terms and conditions apply.*

Add-Ons:
Commercial Matterport Bundle:

A set of Commercial 3D Assets for import into third party programs. This Matterport Bundle contains color point cloud (.xyz), reflected ceiling plan image (.jpg and .pdf), high resolution floor plan image (jpg and .pdf), and OBJ file of the 3D mesh (.obj). This Matterport bundle is for architects and engineers for as built designs and construction professionals for documentation and turnover packages. 3D date is accurate to within 1% of reality. Point cloud and OBJ scale: 1 unit = 1 meter. Ceiling plan and floor plan images contain a scale legend. $100 (Can be added on to Matterport Real Estate Bundle, only.)

Vacation Rental Bundle:

Get a 360 tour (similar to the interactive 3D Virtual Tour, but compatible with Vrbo and HomeAway) placed on your listing on Vrbo and/or HomeAway.

Both Vrbo and HomeAway: $75
One or the other:$50
(Can be added on to Matterport Real Estate Bundle, only)
Floor Plan:

Not Available for listings over 40,000 square feet. $100 (Can be added on to Matterport Real Estate Bundle, only.)

Google Street View for Businesses:

Add your business’s 3D Virtual Tour to Google Street View. Must give Google login to Matterport Service Partner to complete this service. $50 (Can be added on to Matterport Real Estate Bundle, only.)

Expedited Delivery:

Get your purchases next day. Normal delivery is within 3 days. $50 (Can be added on to Matterport Real Estate Bundle or photos alone.)

Virtual Staging:

$50 a photo

Photos only. Virtual Tours cannot be virtually staged. We use our best judgement to virtually stage. Requests for certain color schemes or styles are welcome. No re-edits on virtual staging. If a photo must absolutely be changed, there is a re-edit fee of $25 a photo.

Travel Fee:

Anywhere further than 30 miles from 91741. (Further than 50 miles requires a custom quote.) $50 (Can be added on to Matterport Real Estate Bundle or photos alone.)
